preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 10 g of Sodium (Na). 
 2. Weigh out 5 g of Palladium (Pa). 
 3. Weigh out 3 g of Scandium (Sc). 
 4. Weigh out 30 g of Selenium (Se). 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine the weighed ingredients thoroughly using a spatula until a homogeneous mixture is achieved.
